required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Lenalidomide With or Without Rituximab and Other Drugs in B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphomas
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Lenalidomide With or Without Rituximab and Other Drugs in B-cell Non-Hodgkin Lymphomas: a Real-world Study.

brief_summary.textblock: Describe the treatment of B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients who receive lenalidomide single drug or lenalidomide combined with rituximab (with or without other drugs), and evaluate the efficacy and safety of lenalidomide single drug or lenalidomide combined with rituximab (with or without other drugs) in the real-world setting.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a multi-center prospective, observational real-world study, targeting patients with B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphomas. This study is designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of lenalidomide single drug or lenalidomide combined with rituximab (with or without other drugs) in the real-world setting.
This study will mainly focus on the following three cohorts:
Cohort 1: patients diagnosed with CD20-positive diffuse large B-cell lymphoma; Cohort 2: patients diagnosed with CD20-positive follicle lymphoma; Cohort 3: patients on maintenance treatment who have achieved complete remission or partial remission after induction therapy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of Cycle 6 (each cycle is 21-28 days)
primary_outcome.description: Rate of objective response, defined according to Lugano 2014 criterion.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of Cycle 6 (each cycle is 21-28 days)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of complete response, defined according to Lugano 2014 criterion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of Cycle 6 (each cycle is 21-28 days)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of partial response, defined according to Lugano 2014 criterion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From response evaluation to study completion, an average of 2 years.
secondary_outcome.description: Time to relapse or progression, measured from documentation of response, in CR or PR patients
The rate of patients who are free of disease progression or death as a result of any cause, measured from entry onto study, in all patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From entry onto study to study completion, an average of 2 years.
secondary_outcome.description: Death as a result of any cause, measured from entry onto study, in all patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From entry onto study to study completion, an average of 2 years.
secondary_outcome.description: any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From entry onto study to study completion, an average of 2 years.
secondary_outcome.description: An adverse event when the patient outcome is death, life-threatening, required intervention to prevent permanent impairment or damage, hospitalization, disability or permanent damage, congenital anomaly or birth defect, or other important medical events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From entry onto study to study completion, an average of 2 years.

arm_group.description: Treatment-naive or relapsed/refractory CD20+ diffuse large B-cell lymphoma patients who receive induction therapy containing lenalidomide.
Treatment-naive or relapsed/refractory CD20+ follicular lymphoma, mantle cell lymphoma and marginal zone lymphoma patients who receive induction therapy containing lenalidomide.
B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients who achieve complete or partial remission after induction therapy and receive maintenance therapy containing lenalidomide.

study_pop.textblock: This study focus on patients diagnosed with B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and treated with lenalidomide single drug or lenalidomide combined with rituximab (with or without other drugs) in the real-world setting.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed as B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
- Voluntary participation in this study and the signing of an informed consent form
- The researchers assessed that the patient will benefit from the treatment of lenalidomide single drug or lenalidomide combined with rituximab (with or without other drugs)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contradictions to any drug in the treatment regimen
- Pregnant or lactating women
- Patients who were not considered suitable for the study by the researchers

responsible_party.investigator_title: First Deputy Director of Shanghai Institute of Hematology
